previous.excerpt:
Based on pre-IPO trading on prediction markets and FTX, Coinbase's implied IPO
market capitalization is $64 billion.

This would place it in the Top 200 U.S. traded stocks by market cap
[https://assetdash.com/] in the same range as:

 * Square 93B
 * Goldman Sachs $91B
 * Truist Financial $64B
 *…

*广场93B
*高盛910亿美元
*Truist Financial 640亿美元
*…
